About Us

Building a better future for underprivileged communities in Pakistan

ğŸ¯

Our Mission

To empower underprivileged communities in Pakistan by providing sustainable income opportunities, skills development, and resources that enable them to build better lives for themselves and their families.

ğŸ‘ï¸

Our Vision

A Pakistan where every individual has access to economic opportunities, quality education, and the resources needed to achieve their full potential and contribute to society's progress.

Our Journey

2018

Foundation

Zariya e Muash was established with a vision to create sustainable income opportunities.

2019

First Training Center

Opened our first vocational training center in Islamabad.

2020

COVID-19 Response

Launched emergency support programs for affected communities.

2021

Expansion

Extended operations to 5 new districts across Pakistan.

2022

Major Milestone

Reached 10,000+ beneficiaries across all programs.

2023

Innovation

Introduced digital skills training programs.
